title: Ketu Transit in Sixth House: Silent Victories, Detached Service, and Karmic Cleansing
summary: For Aquarius Ascendant, Ketu transiting the sixth house brings a phase of karmic cleansing linked to work, health, and conflicts. There is growing detachment from daily struggles, office politics, and competitive pressure. You may prefer quiet efficiency over recognition. Hidden enemies weaken without confrontation, and disputes resolve subtly. Health requires conscious discipline, especially stress-related or psychosomatic patterns. When service is performed without ego and routines are handled mindfully, this transit strengthens inner resilience and delivers silent but lasting victories.

sections.title: Health and Discipline
points: Focus on chronic or ignored issues

closing: Ketu in the sixth house teaches Aquarius Ascendants that calm persistence and selfless service overcome challenges more effectively than constant struggle.
